task.name: graphExpertise
task.question: Do you have any expertise with network or graph visualizations?
task.description: Do you have any expertise with network or graph visualizations?

task.name: nodeCount
task.question: Estimate how many nodes there are in total in this network?
task.description: Estimate the number of nodes in a graph.

task.name: edgeCount
task.question: Estimate how many edges there are in this network.
task.description: Estimate the number of edges in a network.

task.name: mostConnected
task.question: Find and select the most connected node in the network.
task.description: Find the most connected node in a network.

task.name: findNode
task.question: Find and select in the network the node labeled: $1$
task.description: Find a node given its label.

inputs.description: The name of the node to be looked for.

task.name: findLink
task.question: Is there a link between the two selected nodes?
task.description: Determine if there is a link between two nodes.

task.name: findNeighbor
task.question: Find and select a common neighbor of the two selected nodes (if there is one).
task.description: Find a common neighbor of two selected nodes.

task.name: findPath
task.question: Find a path between the two selected nodes and select it.
task.description: Find a path between two selected nodes.
